title: Looking for a low grade T206 Ohara ST L at around $1k
author: bbcard1

posts.post_title: Looking for a low grade T206 Ohara ST L at around $1k
posts.post_content: Looking for a decently presenting T206 Ohara St. L. at $750-$1k.  Will take an A through a 2.  I've had a couple offered to me but either the eye appeal was horrible or the price was too high for the condition of the card...but if you may have something I would be interested in, shoot me an email/PM.
